alert.note: Alert for Atchison; Doniphan (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 30 at 7:10PM CDT until July 30 at 7:30PM CDT by NWS Kansas City
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 730 PM CDT FOR DONIPHAN...ATCHISON...CENTRAL BUCHANAN...HOLT...SOUTH CENTRAL NODAWAY...ANDREW AND SOUTHWESTERN DEKALB COUNTIES... At 709 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Troy, moving southeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Law enforcement reported several trees down across roads in Oregon Missouri. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... St. Joseph, Atchison, Savannah, Wathena, Elwood, Mound City, Highland, Troy, Country Club Villa, Country Club, Oregon, Effingham, Amazonia, Rushville, Lancaster, Forest City, Fillmore, White Cloud, Muscotah and Denton. This includes the following highways... Interstate 29 between mile markers 40 and 88. Interstate 229 between mile markers 0 and 14. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
